projects.name: Car Price Prediction
projects.description: Predicted car prices with 8 regression models, achieving 97% accuracy using Random Forest model. The Project aims for the transparency of car prices in the market among the customers and sellers.

projects.name: Smart IOT Cradle System
projects.description: Built an innovative Smart IoT Cradle System designed to monitor and enhance infant care. Used Arduino Uno, sensors(Ky-037 sound sensor, Proximity sensor, DHT-11 sensor,HC-05 Bluetooth Module,ESP 8266 WIFI module) and Conducted data collection and analysis to optimize cradle.

experiences.description: Developed a Python-based sentiment analysis tool for financial news, delivering real-time insights to enhance trading strategies and decision-making with a data of over 4000 entries. Provided predictive insights for investors, financial analysts, and market researchers with a F1-Score 51%.

Trained in ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system architecture and managed 10+ Excel spreadsheets, optimizing data organization and WATI software. Created an SQL database for real-time employee attendance, enhancing data accuracy by 95% and saving 40 hours monthly.
